about_the_game:
🚗 Gear up for mayhem in this arcadey couch competitive car combat game!

Buckle up and dive into the adrenaline-fueled world of vehicular chaos with thisaction-packed car combat game.

🌐 Multiple Arenas Await!

Choose your battleground from a variety of arenas, each with its own unique challenges and tactical opportunities. From the suburbs to warehouses, every setting is a canvas for vehicular destruction.

🤖 Challenge Friends or Go Solo!

Gather up to 4 friends on the couch for split-screen mayhem, or go solo and take on AI opponents in a challenging single-player mode. The competition is fierce, but victory is sweeter when earned against your friends!

👊 Easy to Learn, Hard to Master!

Accessible controls make it easy for newcomers to jump in, but mastering the art of vehicular warfare will separate the rookies from the champions. Take advantage of the skies strategically—temporarily fly to flee danger, gain a tactical advantage, or rain chaos from above! Are you ready to claim the title of the ultimate road warrior?

🎮 Couch Competitive Madness Awaits!

Grab your controllers, rev your engines, and get ready for a car combat experience like no other. Drive, shoot, and outmaneuver your way to victory in our adrenaline-pumping, couch competitive car combat game. The road to glory starts here!

name: Mischief Motors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Gear up for intense couch competitive car combat! Customize your ride, equip temporary flight, and dominate dynamic arenas. Gather up to 4 friends locally or go solo in thrilling game modes. Drive, shoot, fly and outmaneuver your way to victory in this adrenaline-pumping experience!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
